info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 27 at 3:02PM EST until November 27 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EST FOR CENTRAL INDIANA...CENTRAL WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHEASTERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES... At 301 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Apollo to Greensburg, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Indiana, Jeannette, Homer City, Murrysville, Blairsville, Delmont, Black Lick, Clymer, Avonmore, Saltsburg, and West Lebanon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
